title: Rabindranath Tagore
overview: Docudrama about the life of Rabindranath Tagore, Indian polymathâ€”poet, writer, playwright, composer, philosopher, social reformer and painter, who reshaped Bengali literature and music as well as Indian art, becoming in 1913 the first non-European and the first lyricist to win the Nobel Prize in Literature. The film was released during Tagore's birth centenary year.
